channel.title: [READ] Need Help?
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/9qfq5s.png[/img]
Yet other people can create their own methods of helping out the community and putting them onto this site, and users from this site are using them. That are outside of mopar. Look in the Server Help section people have the same problems, over and over, simple ones, if they can't figure it out by people POSTING on THREADS telling them what to do and how to do it, is NOT helping them. People would much rather prefer actual help, and interaction, unfortunately MOPARSCAPE doesn't alert my phone when I'm not sitting on my computer all day and I'm out having a life, or doing something, etc, being out and about get it? I get the alert, and they can get FAST help, and there's other people I can put them in contact with depending on their needs. This is more than just a help section, we're here to provide MOPARSCAPE users FAST, and EFFICIENT help with anything of their RSPS related needs, so there isn't a bunch of the same threads because people can't figure out how to fix, or they don't get what they need from past threads. Or maybe their error or issue is a LITTLE different than anyone they could find, but they don't understand it, we're also here to help teach REAL Java, so there can be MORE real programmers in the MOPAR community. We're not stealing users or anything, again we're HELPING. This shouldn't be a issue.

item.title: [READ] Need Help?
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer
item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

Pure_:

If I was you I would ignore all replies above, but note this: if you want to help you can always browse the server help section.

I am, I don’t need help I’m trying to provide help.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: [READ] Need Help?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Based on this : https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,670506.msg4483473.html#msg4483473
I don’t see why anyone would want to ask you for help.

Read full topic

item.title: [READ] Need Help?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“FoHammer, post:6, topic:551782”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=670696.msg4484969#msg4484969 date=1433438427]

Think I haven’t seen the the notify button, it’s called DATA.

So hold on…
You want people to contact you 24/7 using skype (Which takes a ton more DATA than an email) rather than monitoring a board… That seems very logical here.

The fact is not everyone that is on the team, and will be helping users use mopar, and cba to daily.

That’s not exactly our fault they’re not on mopar. You’re the one so “dedicated” to helping users, you should make your “team” all join mopar.
Why? It’d put a name out there for you. If everyone in your team had a signature that said you were part of said team, and actually helped people… People would catch on.

I don’t need to point anything out, like you say use the Search Engine, there’s actually quite a bit of them, their just not mapped out and put together good, so they didn’t raise barely any awareness

No, I want you to show me some of these services supposedly posted on mopar… The reason you won’t is because you can’t.

The J program was more better than this, and they had more resources, and more fluent programmers, but noone’s really trying to help people out like this currently, and it’s a better helping and teaching method. and will def help the community, and users who use this.

“More better”.
The Team-J Program didn’t do very much. I personally would know as you can see my name is still on it. Honestly, there was no influx of people asking for help. I had about the exact same volume of people coming to me for help as per usual.

All it does, and I mean this, is it puts a bunch of names together for people to look at.

If a person is not willing to help themselves, then they’re not going to get anything out of someone else helping them. Therefore, the way this site works is just fine for how help is provided. People have to want it enough to register an account, and then post a topic about that issue. Plus, that doesn’t mention the 670k topics on the website or the 4 million replies (Numbers based on post IDs. not actual statistics)…

And if you want to talk about “no one trying to help people out”. Go look in the Server Help section. I sure as hell don’t see you in any of the posts.
[/quote]

Yup, I can get their notification, DATA free via skype when I’m out and about, and can contact one of my partners.
Now that’s not too bad of a idea. Go look harder. BTW, I could point numerous out, because I’m not doesn’t mean that I can’t.
And you’re welcome for your interface one of my artist created for you.[/quote]
First, any notification sent by skype would use 3g/4g data or wifi if available. Skype is an instant messaging application. There’s no way you can use it without using up your precious data or a wifi connection. And the fact that you keep not pointing them out even though I’ve asked 3 times to is proving you can’t…

Lastly, Jack is not “your artist”:

[5/31/2015 11:22:27 PM] Jack Fisher: will these be the xp rates or will they be increased [5/31/2015 11:23:01 PM] Sk8rdude (Username): I'm not certain at this point. that's one thing that is being tested [5/31/2015 11:23:10 PM] Sk8rdude (Username): not sure if they're too hard, too easy, etc [5/31/2015 11:23:29 PM] Jack Fisher: i'd make them a little bit easier, not too much though [5/31/2015 11:23:38 PM] Jack Fisher: combat seems pretty slow [5/31/2015 11:41:25 PM] Jack Fisher: btw [5/31/2015 11:41:34 PM] Jack Fisher: im not a part of his simplicity studios [5/31/2015 11:41:53 PM] Jack Fisher: XD

Read full topic

item.title: [READ] Need Help?
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer
item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:5, topic:551782”][quote author=FoHammer link=topic=670696.msg4484931#msg4484931 date=1433386513]
Think I haven’t seen the the notify button, it’s called DATA.
[/quote]
So hold on…
You want people to contact you 24/7 using skype (Which takes a ton more DATA than an email) rather than monitoring a board… That seems very logical here.

The fact is not everyone that is on the team, and will be helping users use mopar, and cba to daily.

That’s not exactly our fault they’re not on mopar. You’re the one so “dedicated” to helping users, you should make your “team” all join mopar.
Why? It’d put a name out there for you. If everyone in your team had a signature that said you were part of said team, and actually helped people… People would catch on.

I don’t need to point anything out, like you say use the Search Engine, there’s actually quite a bit of them, their just not mapped out and put together good, so they didn’t raise barely any awareness

No, I want you to show me some of these services supposedly posted on mopar… The reason you won’t is because you can’t.

The J program was more better than this, and they had more resources, and more fluent programmers, but noone’s really trying to help people out like this currently, and it’s a better helping and teaching method. and will def help the community, and users who use this.

“More better”.
The Team-J Program didn’t do very much. I personally would know as you can see my name is still on it. Honestly, there was no influx of people asking for help. I had about the exact same volume of people coming to me for help as per usual.

All it does, and I mean this, is it puts a bunch of names together for people to look at.

If a person is not willing to help themselves, then they’re not going to get anything out of someone else helping them. Therefore, the way this site works is just fine for how help is provided. People have to want it enough to register an account, and then post a topic about that issue. Plus, that doesn’t mention the 670k topics on the website or the 4 million replies (Numbers based on post IDs. not actual statistics)…

And if you want to talk about “no one trying to help people out”. Go look in the Server Help section. I sure as hell don’t see you in any of the posts.[/quote]

Yup, I can get their notification, DATA free via skype when I’m out and about, and can contact one of my partners.
Now that’s not too bad of a idea. Go look harder. BTW, I could point numerous out, because I’m not doesn’t mean that I can’t.
And you’re welcome for your interface one of my artist created for you.

Read full topic

item.title: [READ] Need Help?
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer
item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:551782”]Difference between Team J-Program and this was we were offering to help people on site AND on skype
And you were only offering to help people via some random skype networking.

Also, your argument on getting notified where ever you are is invalid.

  1. You can get notified via EMAIL every time a new post in a board is made. You want to know how? Click this magical button that shows up on each board: . Install an email app (9/10 smartphones come with the shit anyways), and boom, instant notifications!
  2. Everyone wants a break. Being on call 24/7 will annoy you. I like to take a day off from doing anything programming related here and there. Not being able to have some solitude would irritate me even more.
  3. Unlike skype, and other programs, ANYONE can access moparisthebest.com with a browser and internet connection. While on skype you must be on a compatible device, along with having internet access.

Lastly, besides Team J program, I’d like for you to point out any other service people created to help others.

Edit: you are also NOT posting in the help section, so quit your rant about the help section. Lol.[/quote]

Think I haven’t seen the the notify button, it’s called DATA.
Not everyone has free data and roam, anyway and we’re providing help through skype AND mopar, my arguement with Zymus was me being allowed to do this, which I am, and so is any other user…
The fact is not everyone that is on the team, and will be helping users use mopar, and cba to daily. I don’t need to point anything out, like you say use the Search Engine, there’s actually quite a bit of them, their just not mapped out and put together good, so they didn’t raise barely any awareness. The J program was more better than this, and they had more resources, and more fluent programmers, but noone’s really trying to help people out like this currently, and it’s a better helping and teaching method. and will def help the community, and users who use this.

Read full topic

  2. Everyone wants a break. Being on call 24/7 will annoy you. I like to take a day off from doing anything programming related here and there. Not being able to have some solitude would irritate me even more.
  3. Unlike skype, and other programs, ANYONE can access moparisthebest.com with a browser and internet connection. While on skype you must be on a compatible device, along with having internet access.

Lastly, besides Team J program, I’d like for you to point out any other service people created to help others.

Edit: you are also NOT posting in the help section, so quit your rant about the help section. Lol.

Read full topic
